arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
english: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an

arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
english: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims

arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
english: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know

arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
english: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree

arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ
english: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter

arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
english: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad

arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
english: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful

arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ
english: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved

arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
english: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
english: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples

arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
english: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him

arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَسۡلُكُهُۥ فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
english: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals

arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
english: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples

arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ
english: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend

arabic: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ
english: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
english: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers

arabic: وَحَفِظۡنَٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ رَّجِيمٍ
english: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]

arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ
english: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡزُونٖ
english: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing

arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
english: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers

arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
english: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure

arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ
english: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers

arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ
english: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ
english: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come]

arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ
english: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
english: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud

arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
english: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire

arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
english: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud

arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
english: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration

arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعُونَ
english: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
english: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated

arabic: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
english: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate

arabic: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
english: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud

arabic: قَالَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٞ
english: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled

arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
english: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
english: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنظَرِينَ
english: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

arabic: إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡوَقۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡلُومِ
english: Until the Day of the time well-known

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
english: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all

arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنۡهُمُ ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
english: Except, among them, Your chosen servants

arabic: قَالَ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَيَّ مُسۡتَقِيمٌ
english: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight

arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ
english: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators

arabic: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوۡعِدُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
english: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all

arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ
english: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs

arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
english: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]

arabic: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلٍّ إِخۡوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
english: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other

arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ
english: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed

arabic: ۞نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
english: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful

arabic: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِي هُوَ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ٱلۡأَلِيمُ
english: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment

arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ عَن ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ
english: And inform them about the guests of Abraham

arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمۡ وَجِلُونَ
english: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you

arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
english: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy

arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
english: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform

arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ
english: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing

arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
english: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray

arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
english: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers

arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ
english: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
english: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all

arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
english: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind

arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
english: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot

arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ
english: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown

arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ
english: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing

arabic: وَأَتَيۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
english: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful

arabic: فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعٖ مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱتَّبِعۡ أَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدٞ وَٱمۡضُواْ حَيۡثُ تُؤۡمَرُونَ
english: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded

arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ
english: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning

arabic: وَجَآءَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ
english: And the people of the city came rejoicing

arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ
english: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me

arabic: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ
english: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me

arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَوَلَمۡ نَنۡهَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people

arabic: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
english: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]

arabic: لَعَمۡرُكَ إِنَّهُمۡ لَفِي سَكۡرَتِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
english: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly

arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ مُشۡرِقِينَ
english: So the shriek seized them at sunrise

arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
english: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
english: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern

arabic: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٖ مُّقِيمٍ
english: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers

arabic: وَإِن كَانَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ لَظَٰلِمِينَ
english: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers

arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ
english: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡحِجۡرِ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
english: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers

arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا فَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
english: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away

arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
english: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure

arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ مُصۡبِحِينَ
english: But the shriek seized them at early morning

arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
english: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn

arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِيلَ
english: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness

arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
english: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ
english: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an

arabic: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers

arabic: وَقُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
english: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner

arabic: كَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡمُقۡتَسِمِينَ
english: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators

arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُواْ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عِضِينَ
english: Who have made the Qur'an into portions

arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
english: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all

arabic: عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
english: About what they used to do

arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
english: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists

arabic: إِنَّا كَفَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَهۡزِءِينَ
english: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
english: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
english: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say

arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
english: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him]

arabic: وَٱعۡبُدۡ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَكَ ٱلۡيَقِينُ
english: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death)
